name: GPM
description:
IMPORTANT NOTE: Game-breaking bug! Thankfully, there's a workaround.
Copy this file: [WhereYouExtractedTo]\GPM\VRTest_Data\Plugins\x86_64\OculusSpatializerFMOD.dll
and Paste into here: [WhereYouExtractedTo]\GPM\VRTest_Data\Plugins

Annoying little bug, but hopefully not too much effort to move that file!

Also, this game is VR ONLY, tested only on an Oculus Rift CV1, but should work on all other headsets, I hope.

ANYWAY!

OH NOES!! A big friendly recycling monkey robot has escaped the sub-basin robo-zoo and has mad diarreah, because some air-head fed him with greasy pizza boxes and other unrecyclable trash. Quick, use your tranquiliser beam and hoover up his poop before he trashes the place!

Did I mention that you can fly?

Oh, did I also mention that you can only fly backwards?

Instructions:

Middle Triggers: Vacuum

Index Triggers: Thrusters (Tranquiliser beam on right hand)

A or B (right controller): switch from thruster to tranquilizer beam mode.

Connect either arm to terminal to recharge the beam once you've run out of your first 3 shots.

Shoot the GPM in it's weakspot 3 times to win, but make sure you don't miss! He'll make a mess!!

Watch your trash meter to make sure the sacred grounds stay below an acceptable level of contamination.
